info.title: Mimecast
info.description:
This colleection contains API calls from Tech Connect, Mimecast's public API and integrations site.

For a full list of available API endpoints, visit: https://mimecast.com/tech-connect/documentation

Last updated 2020-01-20

post.description:
To use this call, populate the hash and fileSize variables under the Pre-request Script tab.

Documentation link: https://www.mimecast.com/tech-connect/documentation/endpoint-reference/email/file-upload/
